name: Spinning out of control
tagline: Musings on Multicore and Parallel anything
body:
### Howdy All.
A blog to share my thoughts. I tend to write mostly on Parallel and Multicore stuff but you can find other things from time to time. This is more of a learning blog, so if you find something wrong, take it easy, drop a comment and help me fix it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
